error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '+' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 265
The original flock gains 30-20=<<30-20=10>>10 ducks per year
So after 5 years they have gained 10*5=<<10*5=15>>15 ducks
So the original flock has 100+15=<<100+15=115>>115 ducks
So the combined flock has 115+150=<<115+150=265>>265 ducks
